name: Chancellor Yasmin
aura: Increases Ally SPD in All Battles by 20.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places an extra hit if the target has no active buffs.
skills.name: Resounding Smash
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Heals an ally by 40% of their MAX HP. Heals by 60% instead if the ally has 50% HP or less.
skills.name: Touch of Vigor
skills.books:
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Has a 50% chance of removing all buffs from all enemies. Then places a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn all enemies who have active buffs.
skills.name: Lulling Chant
skills.books:
Level 2: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
